function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive impact of biological sounds and geophysical sounds on restoration, stress recovery, and tranquility perception","Impact":"Improved mental health and well-being from green spaces","Mitigation":"Ensure green spaces are designed to support a diversity of biological and geophysical sounds","Technologies":"Sound monitoring and acoustic design in green spaces","People":"Users of green spaces, public health","Owner":"City planners, environmental designers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Negative effect of traffic noise on green spaces and bird communities","Impact":"Decreased mental health and well-being from green spaces, and reduced presence of bird species","Mitigation":"Implement sound barriers, traffic management, and green space design to minimize traffic noise impact","Technologies":"Noise barriers, traffic management systems, acoustic design in green spaces","People":"Users of green spaces, bird communities","Owner":"City planners, environmental designers, wildlife conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Inconsistent relationship between actual and perceived levels of biodiversity in green spaces","Impact":"Uncertainty about the impact of biodiversity and wildlife on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to understand the relationship between actual and perceived biodiversity, and its impact on mental health","Technologies":"Biodiversity monitoring, subjective perception studies, mental health research methods","People":"Researchers, environmental psychologists, public health","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental organizations"}]}
